column2: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Three (2015) #1
column6: IT'S ZOMBIES VS VAMPIRES-WITH DESPERATE CITIZENS CAUGHT IN THE CROSSFIRE- AS THE LEGENDARY GEORGE ROMERO UNLEASHES THE FINAL CHAPTER IN HIS NEW UNDEAD EPIC! Zombie Autopsy! But is Xavier dead or undead? Dr. Penny Jones may have a nasty surprise coming her way! Who is kidnapping the children of NYC, where are they taking them, and why? The future of Manhattan may rest in the answers!
column8: | penciller (cover):Francesco Mattina | artist:Andrea Mutti | writer:George Romero
